item.title: PostgreSQL with Docker
item.description: Using Docker to work with multiple PostgreSQL versions How to work with multiple PostgreSQL versions at the same time without losing my mind? That’s what we are trying to answer here. With Docker. Docker PG Volumes Data saved in a docker container are lost when that container is destroyed. We can save that data using docker volumes.
